about_desc: We are leaders in the field of financing offer comparison and help our clients find the best financial solution for them.
about_how_it_work_text: Our platform connects to all major banks and allows you to receive personalized offers without leaving home. Simply register to
about_how_it_work_text_second: and all banks compete to give you the best offer.
about_why_bank: Our platform allows sending applications to all banks and receiving the most profitable offers, without leaving home.
about_why_credit: We do not impose hidden services or commissions. Everything is transparent and clear.
about_why_fast: We translate complex banking and insurance terms into everyday language and help with advice at every stage.
about_why_mortgage_complete: Our platform provides solutions from our partner banks in a short time.
about_why_mortgage_complete_title: Two days and the mortgage is ready
about_why_security: We will never use your personal information beyond the purpose for which it is intended.
about_why_simple: Our platform is simple and easy to use.
about_why_solve_problem: Our platform can help all users, even those who think they cannot get a mortgage due to poor credit history.
